name: Ninja Mindness
description:
A game made during the ludum dare 49, the theme was : Unstable.

A 2D runner, pixel art made by 5 students in 72 hours.

The game is an endless runner in a japanese universe, you should try to survive the more you can. 

To reach a better score everytime you play, you have some typical japanese weapons like shuriken, katana, but ... be careful to the other samurai.

Try to reach 99 999.
